page.title: 03HOUSING AT BURLEY WOODHEAD.
page.content: Nearly all the houses have a very interesting history behind them. {Burley Woodhead}was once said to have been as industrialised as {Bradford.} For there were once four mills in the area,these were a spinning mill off {Green Lane,}the middle mill,{Myrtle {Grove mill}and{Hargreaves mill}later called{Rombalds Moor Bleach mill.} Hardly any of these mills still exist. Many of them have been pulled down and turned into houses. One of these houses is{The Glen,} which was once{Myrtle Grove Mill. } It was knocked down and two houses were made from the stone. There was once an old Chapel which has now been made into a house and is called{Chapel Fold.}
